==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* ''Djafar'' or {{Lang|''Jafar''|fa=جعفر|ar=جَعْفَر}} is a character that appears in {{w|One Thousand and One Nights}}, a collection of Middle Eastern folk tales. He is {{w|Scheherazade}}'s father and is the vizier of King Shahryar.
